Parker’s place was great! Right by Main Street so there’s easy walkable access to nearby restaurants and stores downtown. The room itself was very clean and the perfect size for 1 person such as myself. This would definitely be a place I would go back to!

The location and the apartment were perfect. Instructions on how to get to the location and inside were very clear. The parking lot was a major plus as there is very limited free parking in the area - which other places did not offer. The apartment was very clean. It is located on the first floor on the back side with a view to the parking lot (which I enjoyed as the front side is right by the road). During the day we did hear the train; however, it did not impact our sleeping. The only thing that did not work was the remote to the ceiling fan so we were not able to use - could have been user error :). I would definitely stay here again and recommend this location.
Great place. Cozy

Super clean, just like the pics, really liked the gated parking, great detailed communication from Parker.
Great place to stay!

Overall we enjoyed Parker’s property for several reasons. The location was great for walking to downtown Jonesboro. The private gated parking was very convenient as there are times when street parking is an issue downtown. The unit was perfect size for two of us. The place was very clean and there was access to washer and dryer in the room with two detergent packs ready for us. Although we did not partake, there was a coffee machine and complementary kcups. The check in and check out procedures were clear and easy to follow. Parker was quick to respond to my messages when we locked ourselves out. And he was kind enough to accommodate our request for a later checkout. This place would’ve gotten five stars but for two reasons. The upstairs neighbors are quite noticeable when moving around although it wasn’t a major issue. Also the 15-20 foot windows are very nice but allow quite a bit of light through and given the open concept with the bedroom being open to the living space, I’d recommend bringing sleeping masks to block out the light while sleeping. All in all we would probably stay here again if we are back in Jonesboro.
He was great all in all we we’re running late on check out and he was very understanding and overall just a great host

Parker is absolutely the best. He’s very thorough and responds to messages very quickly. The only thing was it needs more insulation or something bc you could hear absolutely everything. It was quite loud at times especially at 2-3:00 am. I loved the layout and the huge windows. Bed and pillows were so comfy. We couldn’t get the overhead fan to work w the remote but the temp was perfect without it. Did not have a tv in bedroom.

I was traveling by myself and this worked great for me. Very clean place. Very modern amenities. Easy check-in and the host was very responsive and flexible. I recommend this place for someone wanting to be near downtown.

Really recommend and hope we can stay again!

Parker was very helpful and responsive to all communication. This apartment was perfect for our brief stay in Jonesboro to visit family and attend a football game! If available, it will definitely be our first option when we come back to town.

The airbnb was clean, beautifully decorated, and in the perfect location right off main street. It's also right across from the Glass Factory too, so very convenient if you're in town for a wedding. Check in and check out were both very convenient. I'd definitely recommend booking this loft

Very easy to navigate to this downtown location. Parker was very responsive to messages and greeted me with the keys as soon as I arrived. Just a heads up, there is only one private parking spot reserved for this location, but there are several public spaces within walking distance if you need an additional spot (the private parking was very much appreciated). Very clean, quiet area. Loved the coffee shop as well. Definitely recommend.

The University Lofts are conveniently located in downtown Jonesboro within walking distance of all the restaurants in town. The place was sparkling clean when I arrived and was comfortable to stay in for an extended stay.

Parker is a fabulous host. He was always quick to help me out if I had a question. The space is perfect for one or two people and located in a great place if you want to be near downtown restaurants, the theater (post covid will be even better), and even St. Bernards Hospital. I don't think there were a lot of people staying there while I was there so it was nice and quiet.

This brand new building is located in the middle of historic downtown Jonesboro. plenty of private parking. Everything was brand new and spotless. Parker was easy to work with during a very difficult trip for me. I will stay again next time!

Perfect space for a large group/family. They had all the essentials but we wished there were blankets, shampoo/conditioner, and coffee available. The beds weren’t very comfortable either. But, overall we had a great stay and it was a convenient location to shops, restaurants, and the A state campus.

We really liked the house because it had plenty of room for my family of 12 to stay for a family reunion at Lake Poinsett State Park. I liked the fact that we could park in the garage making it easier for my 89-year-old Mother in-law to get out of the car during the rain. Also, the house was very nice and nicely furnished. Our grandchildren loved the basement, hanging out watching movies and playing games.

Overall it was a good stay for a large family gathering in Jonesboro. Neighborhood was good and safe; house was big enough and basement was huge and great for the kids. Water pressure was good; towels were plentiful and nice. Kitchen was good although not fully stocked. Beds were decent but would be better without the microfiber sheets. Outdoor areas were unusable as they had not received a Spring clean-up and had sticks, debris and spider webs all over.
I would still stay here again but request the outdoor areas be cleaned up and ready for use and I would bring my own sheets and pillows;-)

Good place. Worked well for our family. We only stayed 1 night and was what we expected from a B&B. It had rained a lot and the pool table room was l little musty but everything else was great, in working order and clean. I would stay here again. The garage won’t fit a full size pick up if that is important to you. A car should fit fine.

This house was the perfect spot for a large group. My family of 8 really enjoyed the pool table and large comfy sofas. There is ample seating throughout the house. We felt right at home. The house was childproof for the toddler in the group.

Our family gathering in Jonesboro at Leonardo’s house was great. The house was comfortable and large enough to accommodate our family of 12. A few things could have been better for all our family but we still had a wonderful weekend together. The dining table only seated 4. It was good that extra chairs were available. Also we didn’t find extra bedding for the futons downstairs. Luckily We brought extras with us. All in all the house was good, close to many restaurants and places we needed. We would definitely stay there again when we are in Jonesboro. Thank you Leonardo for sharing your house.

This house was fantastic! Easy location and a safe quiet neighborhood. There was a lot of room and plenty of options for places to sleep for all my kids. A few extra blankets for the futons in the downstairs family room would have been helpful, but other than that we had a fantastic stay. I would definitely recommend this house and would stay there again if we were in the area. It is even bigger and nicer than the pictures in the listing.

The only glitch we had with this property was at check in. The host neglected to send us the code for check in. We messaged on the app at check in time, then again 20 minutes later. I was able to locate the host's phone number and called as well. We had to leave a voicemail. In the meantime, we were able to get in touch with AIRBNB customer service. They were also unable to reach the host initially. However, they advised us to go wait at a coffee shop (they would reimburse us for drinks) until they were able to reach the host. It was not very long at all before they were able to get in touch with him. He was able to immediately provide check in information and we were able to access property without issue. The host followed up with me and was very apologetic for the mix up. After that- all was smooth. The property was just as described- as well as clean and well maintained.

We had a great stay! Were in town from Madison, WI for a collegiate disc golf competition and Deja Blue was perfect! Two separate living spaces provided plenty of space, and everything was very up to date and easy to use/access! Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay in the area!

I highly recommend “DeJa Blue” for quality family time.

Leonardo also made sure to let us know that there was an issue with the keypad for the garage the morning we were to check in so we weren’t surprised by anything when we got there. This is a great place to stay if you have a large family or group!

I travel to Jonesboro several times a year to visit family and this will be my new go to. No more stuffy hotel rooms for me!

Ellen was an extremely caring and overall amazing host. She was very communicative and tremendously thoughtful. She continued to make me feel accepted at her lovely home by wishing me safe travels whenever I would leave for the day to explore the area. It was touching beyond belief. She helped make my trip another dream come true and I hope to stay at her establishment again in the future, thank you Ms. Ellen!!!

When asked the host for a partial refund due to this inconvenience I was rejected, not offered an apology, and was told "you used to many things at once". Not a good experience representing Airbnb.

wow, what a treat! Ellen's marchbank haven was really wonderful! I love love, loved the big bathroom, and jacuzzi tub!!! super clean, friendly, and accommodating!!! I will definitely stay there again on any return trips! the price was in my budget and I felt very safe!

Extremely well appointed, thoughtful, comfortable and clean space. I enjoyed the snacks, coffee, plush towels & rugs, comfortable bed, beautiful yard and great responsiveness. Highly recommend.
Great place to stay I would highly recommended it if you are staying in the area.

Such a beautiful and comfortable space. We had a lovely time, albeit short. Such thoughtful hosts; you can tell they care a lot and wish for their guests to enjoy themselves. If we are ever back in the area, we will stay again! Thanks so much!

Great stay when you travel with a dog. Very peaceful and restorative as well. I feel nice and relaxed now. Amazing place and host.

I believe I’ve stayed in 19 different airbnbs now and this was by far the most Comfortable and relaxing. I didn’t think that was possible at someone else’s shared home because of my anxiety but Ellen and her husband were very kind and gave us all the space we could’ve asked for while still being compassionate and attentive to our needs. The room and bathroom were over the top beautiful and the bed was the most comfortable place to be after a long 9 hour drive. The little snacks left in the room were perfect for a bed time snack and a drink of water before we hit the road the next day. Would 100% recommend to anyone considering staying here. We would’ve loved to have enjoyed some time in the back yard. Thank you for the wonderful stay

Ellen was a great host, and I had a great weekend stay. The neighborhood is beautiful, and I felt comfortable and safe throughout my stay. Would highly recommend!
This was an amazing Airbnb! It was so cozy, clean, and luxurious! We’d definitely stay here again if we’re in the area!
Great place! If I’m ever in Jonesboro again this is where I’ll stay. Great for the single traveler. Safe, secure, serene! Owners were great. Amenities were plenty! Thanks for the great stay.

Ellen is a wonderful host and I’m sure you will find her space to be superbly clean, conveniently located, and comfortable. I can’t say enough how overjoyed I was at her excellent communication, and the amenities were of such excellent value. I would be eager to stay here again!

Ellen definitely had a gift for hospitality. The suite was beautiful and serene. The entrance makes the location feel private and quiet, exactly what I was looking for. Ellen was attentive without being overbearing. The bathroom is luxurious and a real treat.
absolutely LOVE this place, will most definitely return!

Ellen was an excellent hostess, she even offered us rain gear knowing we were planning to attend an outdoor activity when there was a chance of storms.
The room was well stocked and had lots of snacks and the large tub was a nice bonus too. The desk was helpful to have a place to set up a computer and the bed was comfortable. Would stay again for sure!
Thanks so much!
Oh my god, this place is worth going to just for the bed alone. Bed is so comfortable and you can sink right into it. It is a very cute little stay. Very clean. The host is amazing.
Our stay was excellent! It was easy to find, very clean, and the host even stocked the room with snacks and drinks! I would highly recommend this lovely place!

Ellen is a Superhost.
After a long drive, we were tired and felt at home when arriving. Ellen greeted us and gave safety instructions in case of a
tornado. Accommodated us with snacks, beverages, and a very quiet, peaceful, relaxing environment. The bed was inviting and comfortable. We enjoyed morning coffee while listening to the birds sing from our front door. Great value for your money. Book with Ellen, you will not be disappointed.
Fantastic accommodations! Spotless and perfect! Would definitely stay at Ellen's again.
I loved it the stay was beautiful and it was so peaceful

Ellen was wonderful! I was arriving a day early and she accomodated our family with quick response. Everything was clean and comfortable with tons of snacks and drinks for our stay! She even included soaps and shampoos and bath supplies for a relaxing bath. There was a storm and she even called me to make sure we were okay! We come to Jonesboro every year to visit family and will likely book with Ellen again. Thank you so much for your hospitality! :)

A welcome respite from a very long road trip from WV! My best airbnb suite ever! Ellen thought of everything including the stocked refrigerator, snacks, and chocolates by the bedside! The suite is wonderfully decorated including a very large bathroom with a jetted tub, split vanities, and even a separate room for the bathroom. Very comfortable bed, off street parking, and great outdoor lighting to walk in at night! Highly recommended!!!
Ellen's place was wonderful. Ellen was a great Host. Her place was spacious, quiet, and comfortable. Everything was perfect. Highly recommend her sweet place.

Beautiful, relaxing retreat. It’s even better than in the pictures. Spacious room and bathroom, extremely comfortable. Ellen thought of everything! The details she added (snacks, spa lotions, etc.) plus the amenities available made this spot feel so warm and hospitable. This is exactly what my husband I needed! I wish I could give 10 stars!

I really enjoyed my stay! The suite was quite, immaculately cleaned, free of bugs and very well stocked with amenities. I felt safe and the location was easy to find. The host is very responsive and listed clear instructions on how to get into the property. I would highly recommend!!
Cute little location for a easy nights rest! Quality amenities provided and thoroughly stocked linen closet. Comfortable room and bathroom!

Absolutely beautiful place even more than described. The amount of effort Ellen takes that goes into providing anything and everything you could think of I was blown away by how much she knocked it out the park. The place was quiet cozy and Iwould highly recommend. Thank you Ellen

Upon arrival I tried to open the email on my phone but because of reception in the area I could not. We came to Jonesboro to duck hunt at our new lease and unfortunately the water wasn’t hooked up . So at the last minute I was able to find this beautiful place and it was only a few miles from where we were hunting. Absolutely beautiful, extremely clean, pet friendly , and Mr.Mark makes you feel right at home. I hope to visit again soon ! The natural pool was stunning!

Beautiful retreat for a peaceful weekend. The host did a wonderful job of making sure he's responsive and available without being overwatching or in the way. He let us explore his property on our own and we are grateful for his trust in the guests with his animals and land. His 3 dogs are well socialized, mannered, and even tempered. We brought our 3 dogs and all 6 co-habitated very well in the yard.

This cottage was amazing! I wish we were able to stay longer to fully enjoy it. It was what is in the description and much more. The cottage was very clean and inviting. Our little pup loved yard and a few new friends. Thank you!
Stayed a night with our dogs, place is awesome, loved the farm vibe and meeting new dog friends. Was exactly what we were looking for.

My stay was a 10/10. I was looking for something calm, quiet and peaceful. This was all of the above and more. As soon as I walked in I felt instantly more calm and relaxed. Mark and Joni were very friendly. I had eggs in the fridge on arrival. They made sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed. Brought my pup who isn't normally eager to be around other dogs and animals. She got along with the other dogs and she was entertained by the roosters and horses. I will be back soon!
We had an excellent time during our stay! Beautiful home and surrounds!
Mark was great, beautiful property, I would highly recommend!
10 stars!! Great place! Great host! Mark thought of everything when he created this space. Felt right at home.
We loved our stay! Our 2 golden retrievers loved meeting Mark’s dogs and running around in the yard ❤️

My family loved staying here. My kids loved swimming in the pond pool, even with it being cold this time of year, searching for frogs and trying to pet the tortoise. They loved playing fetch with the dogs and feeding and brushing the horses. The fishing pond was cool trying to identify all the nimal prints around the water, and the chicken eggs were delicious! Thank you for the wonderful stay! The peaceful relaxing surroundings were exactly what we needed to break up our long trip. Would pove to come back again.
Mark & Joni we’re awesome , really enjoyed the pool & meeting Charlie the lab !
Second stay here! Would stay longer if I could!!! If this place is available, take it! Fantastic owners and such a soothing beautiful property! Can’t say enough about this gem ❤️

This stay was exactly what we needed! Very peaceful and relaxed. We absolutely loved all of the animals and the pond. Everything was immaculate and they had several finishing touches that made it feel extra special. The bed was super comfy as well! Overall, we would absolutely recommend this place for a weekend getaway.

This is probably the best Airbnb I have stayed. The beautiful surroundings and the cozy cottage is priceless. Joni and Mark are wonderful hosts. Fresh eggs every morning! Really enjoyed the peaceful “farm” living. Location is really good for mini day trips. My dogs had a blast too! I highly recommend!!
Mark was a great, friendly host. The property is beautiful and the house was very comfortable. There were many additional amenities and nice touches! We had a great stay!

Mark is a wonderful host, super friendly and welcoming. The pool was great, especially for my dog to play around in.
Great place, great weekend

This was such a gorgeous place. It was comfortable, beautiful, and felt like home. Was stocked with anything you could possibly want if you didn’t want to leave but also was very convenient to Jonesboro proper. And the eggs were an added bonus! Would definitely stay here any time we are in Jonesboro area!
I had an incredible stay at Mark and Joni's rental. The cottage was immaculate and the property was absolutely beautiful! Such a treat getting to spend the week in this little paradise.

Mark and his family were absolutely great host! I've got 10acres in Greenbrier, AR with a 6stall horse barn I might mimic this and not AirBnB it!! Great place if you're needing somewhere to stay around Jonesboro.
Such a beautiful and relaxing place! Mark made sure we had everything we needed and then some!

Wow! Most incredible AirBnb we have visited! The place was incredibly clean, updated, and had everything we could have hoped for and more! The shower, bed, and view were heavenly. The BBQ restaurant the recommended could not have been more delicious!
The most incredible stay to also have the opportunity to meet their incredible animal family! Horses, dogs, chickens! All was well worth the stay!

10/10 recommend Mark and Jonis place! This is by far the best Air BnB I have ever stayed in. Their place is quiet, peaceful, serene, and homey. Every amenity you could ever want is provided. It was a perfect place to unwind. Mark and Joni are so kind and gracious! Their natural pond pool is fabulous, and their pups were super friendly with ours. We will definitely return and will recommend their place to everyone!
beautiful home and farm. loved watching the horses and chickens and my dog had a good time too!

Awesome place to stay one of the hidden gems on Airbnb. If you are in the area or looking for a nice place to get away and stay this is an incredible option. Pool is super fun and has a turtle, can feed horses and relax. Very comfortable
This place was absolutely gorgeous. Mark and Joni have thought of everything that we could have wanted. We were only sad we didn’t have more time.

I can't say enough positive things about our stay. The location is beautiful, the house was so clean and cozy, and their doggos are so friendly! We brought our dog for a weekend vacation so she could run and swim freely inside the fenced in area. And she did just that multiple times each day, we especially loved it when their dogs played and swam with ours! My husband and I also found their guidebook useful when venturing in town for dinner. We can't wait to come back!

Our little family of 4 stopped in on our way through Jonesboro and this was the perfect little cottage! We loved the animals and swimming pond and enjoyed the fresh eggs for breakfast! Would def come again!
It’s very cozy there and it feels safe. No worries about where you are. Hosts were welcoming and friendly.

Our stay was one to remember. We cannot say enough great things about this space. Everything was perfect! It was a great escape from the hustle and bustle of Chicago. The animals and environment kept us engaged. The swimming area was immaculate and unlike anything we have experienced in the city. Mark and his family were extremely accommodating and kind. We definitely hope to stay there again when passing through and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a getaway.
Perfect for a quiet weekend away. The dog loved swimming and having other dogs to play with! Craig head forest state park was close by and a neat place to see.

This cottage is a gem and its hosts is very accommodating and helpful. The place is fantastically integrated into the small farm and you can use the grounds and pool and retreat at the same time. There are fresh eggs from the chickens and the whole terrain is a place to recharge and unwind. It doesn't get any better! Thanks for letting us being your guests.

We sold our home in Jonesboro and needed an “in between” place to stay before moving out of state. A hotel was not an option with 2 dogs and our length of stay. Clearly Hidden Acres was a perfect fit. Just enough space for myself and teenage son to spread out. Our 2 cockapoos loved meeting the “locals” and I appreciated the fenced in area they could roam. (Didn’t even have to use my doggie bags 🙂) The roosters did wake up early but after some time it was a nice background soundtrack. My gamer son had no issues with the internet and I was able to log in for some quality Netflix time. The location is private and secure. Easy drive to town and amenities. I would recommend this stay for anyone visiting Jonesboro. Would even be fun for area locals to experience the “farm life”. Thank you for a restful experience during a very crazy time of transition.

The property is beautiful and the house was very clean when we arrived. Pictures don’t do this place justice. I highly recommend this listing to anyone looking in the area. We had the pleasure of meeting mark and he was very friendly and welcoming.

This is a beautiful place to stay. The cottage felt just like home. We just stayed one night because we were just passing thru town, but may have to find a reason to stay in Jonesboro again for a longer stay.
We traveled with our doggies, and the area was fenced and we didn't have to worry about them at all. There dogs were very friendly and we enjoyed seeing our dogs interacting with them.

We had a great time at Mark’s spot! Our puppy, Charlie, got to run around and hang out with Mark’s dogs who were all very nice. The backyard is awesome and perfect for visitors with a dog. Mark and his wife were great hosts and we felt right at home.

Cannot say enough great things about the space! It was a quick last minute overnight trip and we were so thankful to find this place. We cannot wait to come back again. Definitely our go to from here on out!

In a word, cookies! They had cookies on the counter when we arrived!!!!! I mean, talk about hospitality! And farm fresh eggs in the refrigerator! Now, you know if there was that level of detail, everything else was just amazing! Amazing surroundings, amazing guest house, amazing shower and amazing mattress!!!!! If you are ever in Jonesboro, Arkansas, run, don’t walk to Mark’s place - you will have the best stay whether it is overnight or a few days!!!!! Just perfect!!!!
I have stayed here several times while working in Jonesboro. Always a comfortable stay! Great hosts!

Mark’s Airbnb was a dream. We needed a place to stay for the night and I wish we got to stay for a week. The pictures online are beautiful, but walking inside surpassed my expectations. Mark thought of everything you could need, all the cabinets were stocked. The place was spotless and we loved the area. Mark also let us feed their beautiful horses carrots which was a great experience. One of the best airbnbs I’ve ever stayed at. Thank you for being such gracious hosts.

We fell in love with this place and have booked it on two separate trips. It is set on an idyllic horse farm. I could see horses out the bedroom window. Lots of warm touches like fresh farm eggs, lots of bathroom products and kitchen supplies and a comfy bed. Our dog loved it and loved swimming in the fresh water pool/pond. Highly recommend for city folks it's good for the soul.

Mark’s “pool house” (the structure is the size of a small home) was extremely clean, beautifully decorated and furnished, and located on a beautiful piece of property. This property was extremely accommodating of my dog and would be a great place for kids with all of the farm animals and pool. Hands down a great experience and Mark was extremely helpful and responsive.

My husband and I stayed here as a little reunion for us after not seeing each other for six months and it was everything we could have asked for and so much more. Extremely easy to get to, instructions on how to get in were perfectly clear. Getting inside the cottage, we instantly felt at home and peaceful with such a warm feeling inside of the cottage. The cookies are to die for!! We couldn’t get enough of them. Mark and Joni were extremely great in allowing us to use whatever food was there for us to have/use up. The fresh eggs were an amazing touch. The bed is like a square of heaven that you sink right into when getting in, we felt tiny in it and we’re tall people! What stood out for us is all the little things that you would need but didn’t think to bring along with you, all right there for you to use. Our trip was perfect and we loved spending time there. Most friendly and kind people we have come across. And all the animals! We will definitely be coming again!!

If this home is available, stay here!! Exactly as pictured— amenities, animals, and all.
Mark and Joni are responsive and make you feel right at home. They find a perfect balance between making you feel welcome and providing privacy.
Truly a wonderful stay in a little slice of paradise.
We loved staying here. Perfect size and good location. The area was beautiful and we felt right at home. The kitchen and bathroom were well stocked. Would love to stay there again!
This place was wonderful. Definitely will stay here again. Exceptionally clean and identical to pictures. Host very friendly and responsive. Beautiful place.
This cottage house is clean, comfortable and well equipped. Being around the horses was a nice experience. Communication with hosts was flawless. Highly recommend.
Amazing…had a fantastic stay. Slept great after a busy day. Amenities are amazing and will have you rebooking before you leave! Hospitality impeccable! Fantastic hosts!

I have stayed here a few times now while in town for work. Excellent place! Clean, safe and inviting!
Janet
Great place, beautiful and clean. Great host!

Wonderful place to stop over for the night. Made us wish we could have stayed longer. The cabin was well appointed, well stocked, and extremely comfortable. Thank you Mark and Joni for being kind and gracious hosts.
Wonderful stay as always. Mark and Joni are such wonderful people, you won't regret staying here!
Wonderful place to stay!

This was my first time staying in the area that wasn't Memphis. I was worried and not sure what to expect, but Mark and Joni's private haven felt secure and beyond safe. The fresh eggs? 🥹💙 I felt cared for at their guest house. Waking to a rooster and taking in the beautiful decor, views, and sunrise are the best way to start the day. Will definitely try to come by again in the future.
Better than home, a quiet little farmhouse get away! More like your “best friends guest house”

One of the best Airbnb stays we’ve had! Highly recommend, especially if you have small children. Our kids loved seeing the chickens and horses! The accommodations were beautiful and would absolutely stay here again!

My wife and daughter stayed here while visiting family so this review is written by them. This house was perfect, first as you drive up the grounds are just beautiful. It's very clear that Mark and Joni take wonderful care of their property and animals. When we arrived Mark was there tending to the horses and he was so nice chatting with us and letting my daughter pet and feed them, he even showed us where extra treats were so she could feed them anytime. Walking into the home it smelled of peppermint and was so clean and nicely decorated. They had cookies waiting for us on the counter, my daughter hasn't stopped talking about how good they were. The kitchen is well appointed. The bed and pillows were so comfortable, probably the nicest of any Airbnb we've stayed at. The shower is huge, the size of some people's bathrooms, and the master toilet has a warming toilet seat and bidet function. Everything about this home is just perfect. By far the best Airbnb in Jonesboro.
I loved the little farm house feel. Would definitely come back

We really appreciated all of the comforts of home and well-appointed cottage. Mark was very friendly and accommodating and allowed us to leave our pet in the yard while we went and picked up lunch and filled up our car for the long trip back to Texas. Our dog had the time of his life playing with the other dogs and it was a great stay for him as well. If ever back this way, we would definitely stay here again. Thanks for the hospitality Mark & Joni!

This place is AMAZING. If you are looking for a peaceful, gorgeous stay where details and kindness are never overlooked, then this is the place. We’re so grateful to have spent any time here because it is a true gem (and so are the owners!). Our dogs LOVED the place from the swimming pool to the horses. Well definitely be staying again when we come through the Jonesboro area!
Great stay, we highly recommend!
Best cookies ever

This was my 2nd stay this summer at this property & it doesn’t disappoint. Great area, beautiful space, great hosts!
Janet
Was very beautiful n I got to ride a horse!

This was absolutely the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in. The house and property are gorgeous. My two dogs and I had a fabulous time relaxing by the pool and enjoying nature. Mark and his wife were gracious and kind. I felt at home and was able to get some much needed R&R.
Great host and great setting! Enjoyed our time there very much.
this place is phenomenal Mark and Joni are the sweetest people felt like family I said will be our new place to stay when we come to visit family a home away from home

Mark and Joni's place was absolutely gorgeous and had everything we needed for our stay. Our daughter loved all the animals and especially enjoyed playing ball with the dogs. The location was easy to find and extremely private. We hope to visit here again one day when traveling. Wonderful stay!!!

Very clean, very cute, very pet friendly. My husband and I recently stopped on our way to see family and could not have been happier with this little oasis. Clearly Hidden Acres is easily one of the top places we’ve ever stayed. The pool/pond was a blast! Our 11 month old pup got to play with the owner’s dogs and conquer her fear of swimming (well, moderately). We will absolutely keep this place in mind next time we’re driving through!!

This place was so spacious and gorgeous beyond imaginable! Mark and Joni were so nice and always just a message away. Their dogs and horses are the absolute sweetest as well as their cat. We absolutely will be back for another stay in the future. Everyday by the pool was such an amazing time spent with family and not to mention the goodies they left out for us and our pups.

Clearly Hidden Acres was an incredible stay, Mark and Joni are two amazing people. I came in town for work and had my two pups with me, they welcomed all of us . When we arrived they had farm fresh eggs that were delicious, my pups loved the pool and were joined by theirs. The atmosphere was so peaceful, Mark and Joni had incredible communication and made sure we were very comfortable. This is probably one of my favorite places I have stayed.

Mark and Joni have one of the best Airbnb experiences we’ve ever been to. If you love beautiful country, animals and a stunning guest house this place is for you!
Inside: You walk in to a 10/10 clean place, serving fresh cookies and fresh eggs from the chickens outside. The bed is extremely comfortable and the master bath is a dream.
Outside: Being surrounded by their horses, chickens, bunny and pet turtle that lives in their pool pond was the best. Our daughter swam for hours in their pool/pond playing with the turtle, and hunting for frogs and tad poles.
Hosts: I’ve never stayed somewhere where the host made feel like we were family members. Mark and Joni allow for total anonymity if you want or to hang out together. We gravitated towards hanging out. They blessed our daughter with a surprise horse back ride for her 10th birthday. Truly quality people!

We LOVED our stay here!! The house was clean, spacious, and adorably decorated! Meeting the animals was definitely a highlight of our stay, in addition to swimming in the natural pool. The farm-fresh eggs in the fridge were such a nice touch. We swung by the store to grab tortillas and cheese to make delicious breakfast tacos!! We'll definitely be back - thank you for the memorable stay!
Beautiful spot to stay that is both warm and functional. Has everything you need for a getaway or a short stay!
Fantastic cottage! Safe neighborhood. Beautiful grounds! Highly recommend ❤️

This was one of the best stays I've ever booked on Airbnb. Period! Mark and his Family were super welcoming and their guesthouse was just great for our small family and pet. It had more amenities than I could've thought of. It was spacious and the bed was very comfortable... If you enjoy nature or have kids, this would be a great place to stay. They have horses, dogs, chickens, a water turtle and some frogs. Also, the natural pool was a very unique experience. It was great swimming in the pool while the dogs were running around and sometimes even joining us in the pool. Whole lot of fun for the whole family. Finally, those fresh eggs that we were offered from the farm tasted outstanding!
Thank you for making us feel at home! We've had an amazing time!

Wonderful! Mark and Joni have a perfectly well appointed guest cottage on their beautiful slice of heaven. Fresh eggs are kept in the fridge from their very own hens and everything you need is stocked in this quaint little cottage. Most AirBNBs do not offer pack and plays which is a huge selling point for those traveling with a little one. The horses, natural pool and beautiful scenery all make for a wonderful stay. The huge shower and comfortable king size bed allowed me some of the best sleep I’ve had. Highly recommend.

Great place and stay!
We felt like part of their extended family.
Our kids had fun as well … enjoyed the dogs, kitty, bunny, chickens, horses, and ‘Thor’, the turtle!

This place gave us just what we needed for an impulse getaway trip. We grabbed supplies on our way in and only left the Acres once for a drive around. The rest of the time we enjoyed the scenery Mark & Joni built (and beautifully take care of daily), cooked in perfectly laid out kitchen, & snuggled in the AC on the amazingly comfortable bed & couch. Our bulldog (Ms. Baileys) got the chance to hang out with Harvey, Charlie & Yadi which was such a blast to watch.
Mark & Joni, we'll for sure be back!

The cottage was absolutely beautiful and the property it sits on is stunning. It was peaceful and tranquil with the lovely horses, chickens, and rabbits nearby.
The interior of the cottage is cozy and modern in design. The shower is huge! The hosts have provided so many amenities and helpful things in case you forget something.
We got in late on a cross country move and were so happy to have the fresh baked cookies that had been left out for us.
We hope to return soon for a longer stay!

This was the best airbnb. Great location and a perfect setting. We made an overnight stay after a long trip and I slept the best I had in two weeks. The most comfortable bed and relaxing place. Enjoyed seeing the horses which were beautiful. My little dog loved all the new dog friends and loved the yard she could walk around in. I could write all day and not be able to give a review that does this place justice. A hidden jewel! We definitely recommend this airbnb if your in the area.

We loved our stay here! It was the perfect weekend getaway for my husband and I. The whole property was incredibly beautiful and felt very secluded. We brought our anxious dog and he got along very well with their dogs and loved swimming in their pond pool!
So friendly and welcoming!

This is an awesome stay! Mark and Joni are really good people. The accommodations are superb. The horses, dog, cat, hens, and rooster are both restful and entertaining. This place is both fun and peaceful. Very close to A-STATE, Sam's, Kroger's, Downtown, and Walmart. It's expensive, but we will have a hard time staying anywhere else in Jonesboro. Nothing else even comes close!

Thank you Mark and Joni for opening up your doors to us! The cottage was perfect! The bed was comfortable, everything was nice and clean, the kitchen was stocked with more then what was needed and the fresh eggs in the morning were perfect! Yes; the pool is shared with the main house and their dogs; but that didn’t bother us one bit! We still had our privacy. We enjoyed the peace and quiet and will definitely be back soon! Thank you both again!
This place is great! It is so peaceful and tucked away, yet so close to everything at the same time. I highly recommend it if anyone is looking for a place to stay in Jonesboro.

Clearly Hidden Acres is gorgeous with its fields, horses, sweet dogs, and chickens with tasty eggs!! The cottage is a very special place. It is beautiful and absolutely adorable. The entire cottage is updated, it is decorated beautifully, has lovely furniture, and the bed is comfy!! The owners Joni and Mark are nice people and very welcoming. They were easily accessible, but at the same time, respectful of my privacy. I was in Jonesboro for the birth of my grandson. I knew I would be staying alone and I wanted to feel safe and I did. As an individual with a disability, the one floor living and the walk in shower were so helpful. It made getting around so much easier. This was the best airbnb I have stayed at.

The cottage was so beautiful and comfortable, but the best part (in my opinion) was the surrounding property! We loved hanging by the pond, and our daughter enjoyed seeing all the animals. The host was also super kind. A great stay!

Magical and fantastic! My husband and I stayed here with our 2 dogs. We loved the cottage and the relaxing atmosphere. The amenities and extras were lovely. Our dogs had a blast in the pool and playing with the host family's dogs. Everyone was kind and welcoming. I highly recommend staying here and will stay here again in the future!

My husband and I stayed a week to visit with friends and family. This quiet, somewhat secluded location, is perfect for relaxing and having downtime. The hosts were very accommodating and easy to communicate with for anything we needed. The bed was very comfortable. The host’s dogs are well behaved and my 2 yr old basset had fun roaming the yard and playing with their younger lab. We would stay here again the next time we are in town.
Really enjoyed our stay. The cottage was spacious, clean and had everything you would need including fresh eggs. The host, Mark and Joni, were super nice. Would definitely stay there again.
Very beautful guest house and property, has everything you could ever imagine!! Very friendly host
This was a wonderful, peaceful place to stay. It was the perfect size and all of the nice touches made us feel right at home.
Had a lovely trip - very cute place, beautiful property, and very clean. It was a relaxing getaway and my dog got along great with all of their animals
what a beautiful peaceful place to getaway
This was a last minute booking that we so appreciated. Everything was perfect. What a cute, comfortable and clean place. We definitely will stay again.

Mark & Joni were wonderful hosts. This was the PERFECT place to stay for us as we traveled cross country with our two labs. They have 3 beautiful labs who are so friendly & were constantly going in and out of their pool/pond to play fetch. The home inside was so beautiful & I felt like I had everything I could need inside. All the supplies (bandaids, dog beds, kitchen supplies, fresh eggs & chocolate chip cookies waiting for us!) that normally would never be in a hotel, we’re super handy. It’s a goal of ours to end up back here again one day. Wish we could’ve stayed longer!
Great place to stay! The location was perfect and we loved seeing and interacting with all the animals. The dogs are super friendly. Check-in was easy. We wish could have stayed longer!

Clearly Hidden Acres is exactly as described, a beautiful country estate with a natural pool. We did not get to enjoy the pool other than to admire It due to the cold weather. Loved seeing the horses, chickens, and dogs. We had our dog with us and he enjoyed playing with theirs. Fresh eggs anytime was a nice touch as well as “Delicious” home made cookies. Also, the bed was extremely comfortable.
Our stay there was great. Mark and Joni are very friendly and accommodating.
Amazing stay, wish we had stayed longer! Best equipped bnb we’ve ever stayed in, the king bed was tough to leave!

Mark and Joni provided the most beautiful homestay for us! Not only were they accommodating to our pets and guests, they went out of their way to ensure we were all comfortable. Dog beds awaited our furry friends when we arrived, fresh eggs were in the fridge for us to enjoy, and we didn't need to worry about forgetting anything because there were extras of all basic needs for us to use and enjoy. Mark and Joni were prompt in their communication and provided the most comfortable stay for us. We would love to come back to Jonesboro and stay here on our future trips!
Wish we could stay here for weeks! This was the perfect stop after a long day on the road. Beautiful, calming, comfortable. We hope to be back soon!

Fantastic place! We loved all the unique touches this stay had to offer like the MASSIVE shower and the bidet toliet seat. My kids even thought the lift recliner was cool! The kitchen is gorgeous and very well stocked. The king bed was soft and cozy. Mark and his wife were very friendly and even let our kids feed their horses. 5 stars from us!

Our stay at Clearly Hidden Ranch couldn’t have been more comfortable for our small family with dog. The guest house felt private and had everything we needed for our one-night stay, including freshly-laid eggs for breakfast, and horses to gaze upon right out the back window. Beautifully decorated, clean, spacious, and well-furnished. We would definitely stay here again, only maybe next time in the summer, when we could swim in the naturally filtered pool. Mark was a friendly, helpful host.
Beautiful place to stay. Comfortable and very accommodating. Special attention to details are wonderful! We highly recommend!

Our family loves this stop on our long drive home for the holidays. The front closet / office is perfect for a pack and play + the fold out sofa means our family of four can all sleep comfortably. The kids love seeing the horses and chickens out the window. The beautiful Christmas decorations made it an especially enjoyable visit. ❤️
Mark is such a great host

Mark and Joni were amazing hosts! The house was super clean, they give farm fresh eggs from their chickens in case you’re interested! you share the yard included with the homeowners, but they never make you feel unwelcome in the slightest! they even allow you to interact with all of their wonderful animals and only ask that you close the gates afterwards! i’m so happy i chose to stay here and will definitely return the next time im looking for somewhere to stay.
This stay was just fantastic! Really nice host, beautiful place with AWESOME backyard and 3 cool dogs. It was just a great experience in every way!
This is a great place to stay. It’s tucked away and quiet. Mark and Joni were wonderful.

We couldnt have asked for more! Mark and Joni are wonderful hosts and they have an exceptional Airbnb. The cottage is privately located in the center of a tree lined gentlemans farm hidden behind a nice neighborhood with a shared back yard with our hosts and Yadi, Charlie, and Harvey, three friendly labrador-esque pooches, and includes a freshwater, plant filtered pool that houses Thor the turtle. The yard is beautifuly landscaped and is bordered by fenced horse patures with Mesa, Outlaw, and Libby, three lovely horses. Out your back door is a private bench overlooking the horses future barn, chickens, rabbits, and Marco the cat. We woke each morning to a roosters crow, pet the dogs with a cup of coffe on the front porch, even fed Thor lettuce, fed the horses apples and carrots. We slept each night in the quiet peace of far off country sounds in the most comfortable king bed ever. We became friends with Mark and Joni during our nearly two week stay, and with family in Jonesboro, we will never stay anywhere else. It was fantastic!
This place is very clean and well decorated! Mark was fantastic to communicate with and I booked this very last minute and he was able to accommodate me. Very beautiful place!

5 stars across the board. Hosts were amazing. They brought us fresh eggs for breakfast. Setting felt secluded but was convenient to the Highway and town. Fenced in yard for puppies, modern clean house. We will be coming back!
Absolute fantastic and quiet place to stay! Highly recommended!
It was great
Just wonderful. We have already booked there twice and will book again when we head back that way!
Wonderful stay at this cottage! It was so cute, clean and fun! Highly recommend for a weekend get away. Our dog had just as much fun running around the fenced in yard!

This cottage exceeds all expectations! The hosts go above and beyond in every way. Driving up to the property is absolutely stunning and just gets better as u get closer. The property is immaculately clean and you feel like you are miles away in your own world when in reality you are quite close to everything! The hosts are personable, great with communication, and willing to help in any way. This is definitely a repeat stay when ever possible!
My all-time favorite Airbnb! Beautiful property with so many thoughtful touches. And the hosts were attentive without being intrusive. Will definitely return!
Perfect little getaway! So adorable! Owners were so kind and we loved all the little details. Our daughter loved the pond pool and meeting all the animals!
Greta place to stay- really appreciated that it was dog and kid friendly!
Beautiful place, impeccably clean, and incredible hosts. Couldn’t have asked for better.

this little cottage is right out of a story book. only cleaner!! very peaceful setting. the bed is comfy, the shower is amazing. all the little touches are there from the antique looking furniture in the office, all the comforts of home in the kitchen, the exposed beams on the ceiling.. I could go on and on. we didn't go out to the little pool but it was very pretty. this is the best little place in the area sure.
Mark and Joni have an amazing property and provide wonderful hospitality. Communication is excellent. The pool is great. I would definitely stay here again.

Marks place is amazing!! Wish we could’ve stayed longer. Thor was chillin by the pool. The dogs and horses were very friendly. We didn’t get to meet the cat. Bed was very comfortable, one of the best of all the Airbnb’s we have tried. Everything was so well stocked. Our dog had a blast as well!

Staying at Mark and Joni's truly felt like a once in a lifetime experience! What an incredibly beautiful and unique property, and with warmth and kindness that couldn't be beat. The space was immaculate and soothing to the senses. The tall ceilings, abundance of light, and high quality appliances, decor and furnishings made me feel like I was in a spa setting! The king bed was a treat, and I slept very well. The walk-in shower, well-stocked kitchen, parking right outside the door, and washer/dryer were also big bonuses. When I first arrived, I took my dog out to swim in the amazing pond/pool. It was so much fun to share that experience together! Do be careful if you use the pool, as it is slippery on the bottom. Joni eventually brought out with their three well behaved and enthusiastic dogs. The four of them had a blast swimming together and fetching tennis balls. I appreciated Joni's company and conversation. Clearly, Mark and Joni both have the gift of hospitality - they made me feel very welcome and forethought every need (and beyond!), yet were always respecting my privacy and space. I also appreciated their prompt and clear communication, and their spirits of generosity that seemed to go into everything. Don't miss out on this incredibly opportunity that is both a "stay" and an "experience!"

It isn't often you get to wake up with chickens and horses outside your window... in a beautiful cottage that is comfortable, elegant and well equiped. Not to mention, the natural swimming with a friendly turtle who greets you with interest... named"Thor." Add to that warm, kind and generous hosts, farm fresh eggs.... not sure how this can be beat. We hope to pass through again one day and highly recommend the stop whether it is your final destination, or part of your journey.

A wonderful place to stay - such a beautiful and peaceful location! Your slice of paradise is perfect for a respite or a weekend getaway! The beds were comfy, the pool and animals welcoming, the house was perfectly stocked, and the host (Mark) was absolutely delightful.

My daughter and I really enjoyed staying at this lovely place on our way to and from a wedding. I am so glad we got to go back a second time as the inside is amazing and has everything you could want. But the true gem is the lovely fresh water pool. We had great weather both trips so were able to just hang out in the pool for hours. Such a treat after a long drive! The location is great for travelers too as it is close to a main highway and easy to find. Thanks to Mark and Joni for being such lovely hosts.

Such a great place! Really enjoyed the unique setting and being able to bring our four legged friend. The farm eggs were fantastic and the place was very well stocked with everything you could need. Mark and Joni were very responsive and flexible for us as we were leaving. Really enjoyed the natural pool!! Brought a twin blow up mattress for our son and made the walk-in closet into a mini room for him. It worked out great! We will definitely be back!
Super comfy bed!

This is an amazing place. My daughter and I loved the natural pool and the relaxed setting. The house is also incredible. It was spacious and clean and the bed was so comfortable. Mark was very helpful and we enjoyed the fresh eggs left in the fridge. Thanks so much and we look forward to staying here again on our return trip from our family wedding we drove to.

This place is fabulous. Exactly as described and more. It’s relaxing and beautiful with fantastic hosts. The kitchen is great, and they even offer a variety of snacks. The natural pool is wonderful - but bring swim shoes if you have them, as the bottom is def a little slippery. Hope to stay again sometime! Thank you for a fun “girls weekend” away from the city!

The place is very nice, quiet and relaxing. It was nice to dip in to the natural pool. Even if the house is within the vicinity of the hosts’ house, we did not feel that they were there because they just respected our privacy. The house is clean with great amenities. Communication with Joni and Mark was easy.

This place is so great. It’s located perfectly in Jonesboro! Right inside the city, but hidden enough to feel secluded and peaceful. These hosts do it right. So many extra gifts and amenities that really make it feel like you’re at home.
Great stay! Home was clean, spacious, and comfortable. The bathroom was super nice. We enjoyed the pool both days. Downtown Jonesboro is a gem and only 10 min from the Airbnb. Hope to come back!

Like a place out of a fantasy book! I was led to Mark's BnB by the cute farm animals, to appease my wife who is really into it. Little did I know I was about to go on a journey! Upon entering the grounds we went through what seemed to be a portal through arching trees, which felt like we were going to Narnia, to find ourselves on the grounds of Marks B-E-A-U-TIFUL Farm. We were greeted warmly by Mark's lovely wife and children, who gave us the rundown of the grounds and area. Next we stood in awe marveling at their three majestic steeds. Before entering our abode we were taken aback by the insanely well crafted pool/pond. It was not only uniquely set up but well maintained, a bit jarring considering I did not prepare swimwear, but I digress. The moral of the story is if you find yourself in Jonesboro AR, this stay will undoubtedly be the highlight of your trip and truly make you understand why anyone lives in Arkansas. Also they have a bidet, 5-stars all around! Thanks Mark, we will not forget our time at your place!

Mark and Joni have created a beautiful oasis of peace at their farm, and to be able to just plug into the calm and quiet and solitude is wonderful. The cottage has every possible amenity and was so clean and satisfying to stay in. As host, they are kind and responsive and easy to work with. You will be wishing you could stay forever !

This was such a wonderful place to stay. Everything was beyond expectation. We were on this trip not really knowing where Jonesboro was at and booked it to the proximity to Memphis. When we were talking with people at our first stop in Hot Springs we received the response of .. “wait, Jonesboro can’t be your final destination...” after some anxiety and second thoughts we could not of been more pleased with our stay.
Great place! Extremely comfortable and clean. It is a great “escape” and you feel far away from everything without being far away. My son loved the animals and the pool.
Perfect setting. Perfect place. Everything was spot on! Kids 4, 5 and 16 loved everything about this place as did my wife and I. Mark and Joni are great hosts!
The guest house is beautiful just like the pictures. We loved our time there and hope to stay there again. Mark and Gina are great hosts.
Best Airbnb to date! The property and animals were awesome but good people make everything better. If we ever have a reason to pass through Arkansas again, we will definitely come back. 5 stars!
Wow!! If you’re looking at this place... BOOK IT! Absolutely beautiful and the host were wonderful!! Relocating for work and this place made me feel right at home!!

Our family simply can not put into words how wonderful our 3 night stay was!
We were on a road trip and were set to go from Springfield, MO onto Memphis for the weekend but we were having difficulty finding a pet friendly location .... so as we were driving I stumbled upon Mark & Joni’s farmhouse. After reading the impeccable reviews and knowing how much our dog and kids would enjoy the farm and space instead of a hotel... I quickly booked it.
The quiet neighborhood we drove through to get to their gates was manicured and lovely.
The first glimpse of the property we all had big smiles and knew we were set for a great stay.
The level of detail, style and cleanliness given to the guest house is incredible. They even had fresh cookies waiting for my children, treats for the dog and fresh eggs from their chickens in the fridge.
The fenced in area for the dog was amazing and the property itself is so inviting to just wander around, go visit and feed the horses, take a walk on the quiet lane, sit by the natural pool/pond searching for the turtle.
Mark and Joni somehow have that rare, magical hosting quality of welcoming you, connecting, making you feel right at home yet also giving you privacy and freedom To explore and relax. It’s incredible!!!
Whether you’re looking for a getaway or traveling through... our family would recommend their place to all!!!
Beautiful little place, easy access and easy to find

This place is somehow even better than the pictures. If it’s available and you need to stay in Jonesboro, book it now before someone else does. Quite possibly the best air bnb stay I’ve had, and I have had quite a few. Horses, friendly dogs, the nicest hosts ever, and an immaculate house. I already miss it!
Excellent place to stay! Very good host with a beautiful and clean home. Would highly recommend to anyone coming to the area.

We very much enjoyed our stay at Mark’s place! Definitely one of the nicest Airbnb’s I’ve ever stayed in. So stylish, super clean and cozy, and they were so accommodating and easy to communicate with. We will definitely be back if we are in the area in the future! Highly recommend!

Fantastic stay! Was in the process of moving back to Jonesboro for work and needed a place to stay with my dog for a week until my move was finished. Mark helped make that happen. Location is perfect, easy access to town but on the edge of town. Beautiful and quiet property with well set up guest house. If you’re in the area on business or just need to get away, can’t recommend this stay high enough.

Such a unique and special experience! We loved being with the horses and all the farm animals. What a wonderful treat to have fresh eggs. We enjoyed our privacy and relaxing while listening to the fountain. The guest house is very roomy, stylish and comfortable. Mark and Joni are outstanding hosts.

This was an amazing stay! The way Mark and Joni went above and beyond to have everything we needed was so thoughtful. The house was a perfectpalce to get ready for our wedding. The decor is so very fitting for the style of home and the animals walking by the windows was an extra treat. The horses, cat, dogs, and turtle were all so friendly. I wish we had more time to stay and sit out on the porch or by the pool. We will definitely come back for a longer stay next time!

What an amazing place! We were just stopping through for the evening and needed a place to sleep and let our two dogs run a bit. The house is spotless and the space outside is perfect for dogs to run and play. Such a beautiful setting. We got to chat with the homeowners for a bit in the morning before leaving and they were wonderful and warm and even offered some medical treatment for our dogs minor injury. Couldn’t recommend more highly if you and looking for a great place to relax and rest. Wonderful bungalow type cottage with master bedroom and bath, and adjoining kitchen and living area. Also a small adjoining office space and powder room. Even a nice turtle hanging out in the pool by right out the front door. We hope to go back for a longer stay in the future.
This place is a great place to stay. Gorgeous decor, easy to find, and cozy!
Wonderful little place to stay. Was perfect for our passing through.

Mark and Joni’s place is amazing. Not only is it beautiful but it was stocked with everything we needed for our trip. We packed groceries and necessities but it was like walking into a fully stocked home when we arrived. I’ve stayed at a lot of AirBNBs and sometimes it’s like walking into a cold and vacant property. Every thing here was warm and welcoming and comfortable. There is something about waking up, walking outside and seeing the horses and chickens and the beautiful field and just being at peace. It was close to local restaurants and we went to the museum at ASU. But really we kept finding ourselves back at the house relaxing and just enjoying the peacefulness of it all. It was too cold to swim but it was so beautiful to sit out back. Absolutely no negatives and only all positives about this place! 🥰 And Mark and Joni were so quick to respond when I asked them anything (like can I feed the horses apples lol). They are really sweet people. Thank you!

I LOOOOVED staying here. The space is so beautiful and so clean. The property is so serene and comfortable. It feels like you’re on a country retreat but you’re just five minutes from everything you need. I will definitely be back!
Mark was an excellent host and the guest house was perfect. Very clean and welcoming.

This was a great place to spend a few days during the fall! The location was beautiful, house itself was spotless. They had a large amount of food/spices stocked for use. The property was beautiful, we loved seeing the horses, chickens, and their 3 sweet labs. Would recommend to anyone!

It was a fantastic stop on our road trip, a perfect space after a long car ride. It was clean, spacious, wonderful lighting and a shower that was insanely big! We would definitely stop here again and will recommend it to anyone passing through.

Very unique, classy retreat from your every day stay! We had a totally private weekend yet felt like family at Marks. Loved the design of bunk house plus loved being so close to the animals! An added bonus of being a quest on this private property is the security! We felt completely safe the entire weekend! Jonesboro is a cool town as well!
*My cat was so entertained by Marks cat
Mark and Joni were so hospitable! We felt right at home! This place is more beautiful than we thought. Our dog loved it too! Would definitely recommend and would love to visit again!!

Beautiful stay! It’s incredibly clean, well decorated, and nicely stocked. We stayed one night and wish we had more time to enjoy. The backyard oasis was a welcome perk for morning coffee and separately, for our pup to run around after a day in the car. If you find yourself in Jonesboro, take advantage of this sweet retreat.
Very welcoming and helpful

This cottage and farm is a wonderful place for a quick getaway, perfect for children and dogs. The location is close to parks and fun daytrips, and peaceful enough that you would be fine not leaving the cottage. Mark, Joni and family were wonderful (and gracious!) hosts - offering fresh eggs, horse rides, and friendliness at no extra cost. Excellent communication. So thoughtful they included a rooster for a wake-up call!

This was the perfect one night stay for our family of four. We were greeted with treats for the kids to feed the horse and a cookie for each of us waiting in the kitchen.
The key code for the door made access quick and easy. The cottage is charming, clean, and up-to-date. The kitten had everything we needed for a making dinner.
We put our toddler in the bedroom and we slept on the sofa bed. In hindsight, we should have switched beds!
This was a wonderful overnight stop on a long drive. ❤️

We would 100% come back here again! My wife is super picky about where we stay, mostly for cleanliness, and this was her first AirBnB experience. If we knew every AirBnB could be like this, we’d do it again. But our guess is that you have gone above and beyond because it literally felt like you were treating us like visiting family. No detail was missed. Perfect experience and absolute dream spot for a vacation during the pandemic. And the icing was getting to bring our dog, who equally felt at home. It was like a piece of country in the city. Worth every penny.

We stayed at Clearly Hidden Acres for a second time this summer while on a road trip. It was so comforting to know we had a familiar, safe, and welcoming space awaiting us. Everything was impeccably clean and bright, and the hosts are so incredibly caring without being intrusive. Our daughter enjoyed seeing the chickens, horses, dogs, and cat on the grounds again. Truly a hidden gem, and once again we found ourselves wishing we could stay longer.

All of the family had such a great experience. This place is charming and Mark and Joni are so kind and welcoming.
We would definitely recommend this place and can't wait to come back.
Incredible hosts! So sweet and kind!!! The place is amazing! Great experience to create a truly incredible weekend getaway!

We loved our stay at Clearly Hidden Acres. The guest house is cozy, comfortable and welcoming. And it was wonderful that we could bring our puppies. The horses are beautiful and friendly and our dogs were very curious about the chickens! Thank you for your hospitality! We hope to be back.
My husband and I visited Clearly Hidden Acres for a brief retreat from life and could not have been more pleased with our visit! This was the perfect place to get a little R&R!

The guest house was beautiful. It had everything we needed for our stay. The garden/pool area was relaxing and perfect for our 2 pups to run and swim. Mark and Joni were wonderful hosts and I would highly recommend their place if you are staying in Jonesboro.

This place is INCREDIBLE! it’s truly special and one of a kind. The natural pool is amazing and being surrounded by all of their animals is so much fun. The only downside was that the mosquitos keep you from enjoying the outdoors at night which we didn’t expect. usually on a vacation we’d swim or sit by a bonfire at night but because of the bugs that’s not possible here. Don’t get me wrong- nothing to take any stars away and i would absolutely return to this airbnb. just make sure your family is prepared to find things to do inside every night! Luckily the inside of the guest house is beautiful and well stocked! The hosts were so warm and inviting as well! You won’t regret staying here!

This place is awesome. They had absolutely everything; it was well stocked for a week-long stay. The property is beautiful, including the guest home. Massive walk-in shower and comfortable rooms. The pool is amazing, we enjoyed our time the whole week. Mark and Joni are the icing on the cake, very hospitable. From cookies on welcome day, to farm fresh eggs, even a quick jaunt on their horse, we couldn't have asked for better. Great stay, would definitely stay here again.

Mark and Joni’s place is absolutely beautiful. One thing I love about staying in Airbnb’s is that I get to experience furniture, appliances, decor, bedding etc that otherwise I would just see in the store and rely on other people’s reviews. This stay let us experience beautiful decor, comfortable furniture and bedding and a stunning bathroom with an amazing shower. So many little touches and beautiful things that I would love to someday incorporate into my own home. They also left such sweet touches for us; fresh eggs and cookies! We loved spending time with their animals (so did our dog) and took in breathtaking views of horses in the pasture and dragonflies above the pool. The kitchen was fully stocked, we made every meal in house and spent our days swimming, hiking and playing disc golf. We really enjoyed our time and hope to be back someday! Thank you for the great, welcoming hospitality and wonderful week!
Beautiful place. Spotless and relaxing. Fun in pool and watching all the animals.

A spectacular place! My puppy and I had the best time enjoying the guesthouse, pool, yard, and local spots (i.e., Craighead Forest Park). Mark, Joni, and their family were all so kind and welcoming! The hospitality was beyond lovely - Even the smallest touches like fresh eggs and cookies. The place was spotless and exceptionally well-stocked! One of the absolute best AirBnB experiences I’ve ever had and truly a relaxing getaway. The natural pool was unique and wonderful. Also horses!

We loved our stay at the Clearly Hidden Acres cottage. The cottage was clean upon arrival and the scenery and natural pool were both amazing. Mark was an excellent host . He allowed us to interact with his horses, which our daughter especially loved. His labradors were also very sweet and got along great with our dog. I would not hesitate to return in the future!

What a wonderful, unique stay! My family and I enjoyed this quick getaway for us and we enjoyed every minute. Clearly Hidden Acres makes you feel like you’re far away from everything; the pool pond, horses & chickens made us feel like we were on a farm stay, but with all the modern amenities to help us enjoy our time! It is also 10 minutes away from things to enjoy, like Craighead Forest Park or one of the many restaurants in Downtown Jonesboro. Highly recommend!

Clearly Hidden Acres ranks as one of our favorite Air BnB’s that we have ever stayed in. Mark, Joni, and their children were incredibly welcoming and exceptional hosts. The property is stunning, the space is outstanding, the natural pond/pool was spectacular, and the animals were the icing on the cake. They even left treats for our dog. CHA is a must stay!

Look at the photos and read the profile carefully. The pool is only a few feet away from the owner's back door, so you will not have any privacy in the pool. You can't tell that from the main profile picture, where the home is JUST cropped out of the left side of the picture. You can only tell from the one aerial photo that's (currently) the 14th of 22 pictures. The property is beautiful, so I'm sure this is a great place to bring the kids and play with the animals and whatnot. But it's certainly not a place for a romantic getaway with a significant other.
